Name: AOMIC-PIOP2
DataProvenance: This dataset is a subset of 4 subjects (0015, 0017, 0035, 0066) from the AOMIC-PIOP2 dataset. This subset only contains T1-weighted MRI, diffusion MRI, and resting-state fMRI; other data files have been removed. This subset is re-shared as test datasets to demonstrate the functionalities of the BrainSuite BIDS App.
HowToAcknowledge: Snoek, L., van der Miesen, M.M., Beemsterboer, T., van der Leij, A., Eigenhuis, A., & Scholte, H.S. (in prep.). The Amsterdam Open MRI Collection, a set of multimodal MRI datasets for individual difference analyses.
